contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Siemiatycze | imagesize = 250px | image_flag = POL Siemiatycze flag.svg | image_shield = POL Siemiatycze COA.svg | image_skyline = Siemiatycze kosciol WNMP.jpg | image_caption = Ascension of Virgin Mary Church | pushpin_map = Poland | pushpin_label_position = bottom | coordinates_region = PL | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{POL}} | subdivision_type1 = [[Voivodeships of Poland|Voivodeship]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Podlaskie Voivodeship|Podlaskie]] | subdivision_type2 = [[Powiat|County]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Siemiatycze County]] | subdivision_type3 = [[Gmina]] | subdivision_name3 = Siemiatycze <small>(urban gmina)</small> | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Zbigniew Jan Radomski | established_title = Established | established_date = 15th century | established_title3 = Town rights | established_date3 = 1542 | area_total_km2 = 36.25 | population_as_of = 2006 | population_total = 15169 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] | utc_offset_DST = +2 | latd = 52 | latm = 25 | lats = 38 | latNS = N | longd = 22 | longm = 51 | longs = 45 | longEW = E | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = 17-300 | area_code = +48 85 | blank_name = [[Polish car number plates|Car plates]] | blank_info = BSI | website = http://www.siemiatycze-um.com.pl }} '''Siemiatycze''' {{IPAc-pl|ś|e|m|J|a|'|t|y|cz|e}} ({{lang-uk|Сім'ятичі}}) is a town in north-eastern [[Poland]], with 15,209 inhabitants (2004). It is situated in the [[Podlaskie Voivodeship]] (since 1999); previously it was in [[Białystok Voivodeship (1975-1998)]] (1975–1998). It is the capital of [[Siemiatycze County]]. == Education == * [[Nadbużańska Szkoła Wyższa]] ==International relations== {{See also|List of twin towns and sister cities in Poland}} ===Twin towns — Sister cities=== Siemiatycze is [[town twinning|twinned]] with: * {{flagicon|ITA}} [[Castrolibero]], [[Italy]] * {{flagicon|GER}} [[Zehdenick]], [[Germany]] {{coord|52|27|N|22|53|E|region:PL_type:city|display=title}} {{commons category|Siemiatycze}} {{Siemiatycze County}} {{Gmina Siemiatycze}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Podlaskie Voivodeship]] [[Category:Siemiatycze County]] [[Category:Zakerzonia]]
